originalText.text: Robin is wonderful to work with; she is very detail oriented, incredibly responsive and has a great deal of legal knowledge as it relates to all topics involved in growing a family.  On top of this, Robin is incredibly kind and empathetic; just top notch.

text.text: Robin is wonderful to work with; she is very detail oriented, incredibly responsive and has a great deal of legal knowledge as it relates to all topics involved in growing a family.  On top of this, Robin is incredibly kind and empathetic; just top notch.

originalText.text: Robin is a fantastic attorney who helped us in the process of growing our family. She guided us and advised us about both adoption and surrogacy journey. She was warm, knowledgeable and always available to answer our questions and help.  We really enjoy(ed) working with her. I cannot imagine navigating this complicated journey without Robin.

originalText.text: Robin is incredibly professional and knowledgeable. She walked my husband and I through the whole process and was responsive throughout. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Robin Fleischner has helped me and my family several times with diverse legal matters. We are consistently impressed by her expertise, efficiency, and kindness. Anyone would be lucky to work with her!

text.text: Robin Fleischner has helped me and my family several times with diverse legal matters. We are consistently impressed by her expertise, efficiency, and kindness. Anyone would be lucky to work with her!

originalText.text: Robin Fleischner was our adoption attorney, and she truly changed our lives. After a negative experience with an agency, we decided to pursue our vision of being parents through private adoption. We found Robin by looking on the website for the Academy of Adoption and Assisted Reproduction Attorneys -- SO GLAD that we looked there! In retrospect, we would have been better off if we had skipped the agency, and started off with Robin. Her knowledge and connections are invaluable. She was so knowledgeable and professional, and her communication was so clear; she demystified adoption for us. She was efficient, reliable, respectful, and very, very KIND to us. We always felt she was working very proactively for us. And when we started working with Robin, our dreams of becoming parents came true very quickly! We are eternally grateful to Robin Fleischner and continue to recommend her to everyone we meet. She is an amazing adoption resource and in my opinion, an amazing human being as well. Thank you, Robin! For everything.
